text: Yggdrasil has come to an end, but some see this as a new beginning.

subcategories.name: Attribute Allocation
subcategories.text:
Attribute values have a fixed limit of 40, which represents 400% of an average human's capabilities

Each attribute starts at 0, but leaving them there is Fatal

For reference, spellcasters only need 20 in their casting attribute to cast 10th-tier spells, provided they have enough mana and high enough caster level to qualify.

Attributes also determine your Skill potential, keep that in mind

options.label: Strength Attribute
options.description: Determines Carry Weight Limit and ability to apply Grapple, Knock Out, and Stagger

options.label: Dexterity Attribute
options.description: Determines Physical Action Speed

options.label: Constitution Attribute
options.description: Determines Vitality Regeneration and Damage-over-Time Resistance

options.label: Intelligence Attribute
options.description: Determines Supernatural Action Speed

options.label: Wisdom Attribute
options.description: Determines the ability to Detect Hostiles Targets and Accuracy

options.label: Charisma Attribute
options.description: Determines ability to apply and resist Mental Status Effects

subcategories.name: Race
subcategories.text:
Choose what type of race you wish to be



Racial and Job Classes grant the users a Martial Level, a Caster Level and Vitality points.

Martial Level empowers Physical Abilities, such as the use of Martial Weapons, determines your Stamina and how many Martial Skills you know

Caster Level empowers Supernatural Abilities, such as the casting of Spells, and determines your Mana Pool and how many Spells you know.

Vitality determines how much damage a character can take before dying or being knocked out.



The Energy Types are: Heat/Cold/Acid/Sonic/Electric/Light/Dark.

Many Races either have Positive% Resistances or a Negative% weakness

Having 100% Resistance means you're Immune, but only if it's gotten from Classes not equipment

Having -100% Resistance means you take double damage and are susceptible to additional effects. All Races are considered as Creatures, but

Creatures may refer to Beasts or other non-playable Races

Living races are every other race except Constructs and Undead

Constructs are Automatons and Golems

Faefolk are Fairies and Nymphs

options.label: Humanoid
options.description: The vanilla option, having little to no innate Physical or Supernatural abilities. They had no Level cost, giving more levels to Job Classes and ensuring their popularity.

options.label: Demi-Humanoids
options.description: Human-like creatures that possessed simple Physical Abilities

options.label: Heteromorphs
options.description: Inhuman creatures possessing a number of natural Physical and Supernatural abilities. They also came with prestige Racial Classes, giving more options to character creation at additional Level cost

subcategories.name: Humanoid
subcategories.text: Choose what type of humanoid race you wish to be

options.label: Deep Dwarf
options.description: Deep Dwarves can see in Dim Lighting

options.label: Hill Dwarf
options.description: Hill Dwarves have +15 to one Martial Arts or Craft Skill

options.label: Mountain Dwarf
options.description: Mountain Dwarves are twice as hard to Knock Out or Stagger

options.label: Subterranean Elf
options.description: Subterranean Elves can see in Dim Lighting

options.label: Tundra Elf
options.description: Tundra Elves have +15 to one Knowledge or Craft Skill

options.label: Forest Elf
options.description: Forest Elves cannot be Detected by sound, regardless of Environment

options.label: Pure-Blood Human
options.description: Pure-Bloods have +15 to one Martial Arts, Knowledge, or Craft Skill

options.label: Half-Blood Human
options.description: Half-Bloods must choose another Race to derive their Bloodline from. Can be considered either Race. They have the first listed ability that their other Race possesses.

options.label: Pure-Blood Human (Caster)
options.description: Pure-Bloods have +15 to one Martial Arts, Knowledge, or Craft Skill

options.label: Half-Blood Human (Caster)
options.description: Half-Bloods must choose another Race to derive their Bloodline from. Can be considered either Race. They have the first listed ability that their other Race possesses.

subcategories.name: Demi-Humanoids
subcategories.text: Choose what type of demi-humanoid race you wish to be

options.label: Cat-like Beastman
options.description: Cat-like forms possess Natural Weapons. Beastmen can see in Complete Darkness and have heightened senses.

options.label: Dog-like Beastman
options.description: Dog-like forms possess Natural Weapons. Beastmen can see in Complete Darkness and have heightened senses.

options.label: Rodent-like Beastman
options.description: Rodent-like forms possess Natural Weapons. Beastmen can see in Complete Darkness and have heightened senses.

options.label: Hoofed Beastman
options.description: Hoofed forms receive no movement penalty regardless of Environment. Beastmen can see in Complete Darkness and have heightened senses.

options.label: Aquatic Beastman
options.description: Aquatic forms can breathe Underwater indefinitely. Beastmen can see in Complete Darkness and have heightened senses.

options.label: Bat Beastman
options.description: Bat forms have Wings and can fly as easily as running. Beastmen can see in Complete Darkness and have heightened senses.

options.label: Shrew Beastman
options.description: Shrew forms can burrow through the ground as easily as running. Beastmen can see in Complete Darkness and have heightened senses.

options.label: Raptor Birdman
options.description: Raptors know how to use Ranged Weaponry. Birdmen have Wings and can fly as easily as running. They can see clearly over long distances, as such their Wisdom is considered 2x higher.

options.label: Songbird Birdman
options.description: Songbirds can use their Sing Skill to afflict Targets with Sleep or Fascination. Birdmen have Wings and can fly as easily as running. They can see clearly over long distances, as such their Wisdom is considered 2x higher.

options.label: Serpentine Lizardman
options.description: Serpentine Lizardmen possess Natural Weapons. They can choose one environment: Underground, Land, Underwater, or Air to gain a 50% bonus to movement speed. It is easier to remain undetected in Forest, Swampland, and Underwater Environments.

options.label: Reptilian Lizardman
options.description: Reptilian Lizardmen possess Natural Weapons. They can choose one environment: Underground, Land, Underwater, or Air to gain a 50% bonus to movement speed. It is easier to remain undetected in Forest, Swampland, and Underwater Environments.

options.label: Amphibian Lizardman
options.description: Amphibian Lizardmen can Breathe Underwater. They can choose one environment: Underground, Land, Underwater, or Air to gain a 50% bonus to movement speed. It is easier to remain undetected in Forest, Swampland, and Underwater Environments.

options.label: Jawed Fishman
options.description: Jawed Fishmen possess Natural Weapons. They can Breathe Underwater indefinitely and see in Complete Darkness.

options.label: Bony Fishman
options.description: Bony Fishmen have doubled movement speed while Underwater. They can Breathe Underwater indefinitely and see in Complete Darkness.

options.label: Goblin
options.description: Goblins take 50% less fall damage. They know how to use Martial Weaponry and can see normally in Dim Lighting.

options.label: Orc
options.description: Orcs have +15 to one Martial Arts or Craft Skill. They know how to use Martial Weaponry and can see normally in Dim Lighting.

options.label: Troll
options.description: Trolls' limbs slowly Regenerate. They know how to use Martial Weaponry and can see normally in Dim Lighting.

options.label: Bugbear
options.description: Bugbears are twice as hard to Knock Out or Stagger. They know how to use Martial Weaponry and can see normally in Dim Lighting.

options.label: Cave Giant
options.description: Cave Giants can see in Complete Darkness. Strength is considered 2x higher, and their limbs slowly regenerate.

options.label: Frost Giant
options.description: Frost Giants have a +50% Resistance to Cold. Strength is considered 2x higher, and their limbs slowly regenerate.

options.label: Mountain Giant
options.description: Mountain Giants are twice as hard to Knock Out or Stagger. Strength is considered 2x higher, and their limbs slowly regenerate.

options.label: Sea Giant
options.description: Sea Giants can hold their breath for up to 8 hours. Strength is considered 2x higher, and their limbs slowly regenerate.

subcategories.name: Heteromorph
subcategories.text: Choose what type of heteromorphic race you wish to be

options.label: Angel
options.description: Have Wings and can Fly as easily as running. Can see if a Creature is Living, Undead, or Construct. Have Divine Spellcasting (WIS or CHA). Choose one Domain, you cast spells from that Domain at halved Mana Cost.

options.label: Fallen Angel
options.description: Have Wings and can Fly as easily as running. Can see if a Creature is Living, Undead, or Construct. Have Divine Spellcasting (WIS or CHA). Choose one Domain, you cast spells from that Domain at halved Mana Cost.

options.label: Djinn
options.description: Can assume an Ethereal alternate form, but only for a short time once every 24 hours. Cannot be harmed by Physical damage, and can walk through most walls and obstacles, but are still affected by magic effects and magic damage, including magic weapons. Have Arcane Spellcasting (WIS or CHA). Are Immune to Mental Status Effects. Can Detect a Target's Karma score.

options.label: Nephilim
options.description:
Strength is considered 2x higher. Choose 3 attributes to cap at 8 and 2 attributes to boost by 8.

RESET YOUR ATTRIBUTES BEFORE SELECTING THIS OPTION

options.label: Elemental
options.description: Elementals are immune to one energy and weak to another.

options.label: Brain Eater
options.description: Can identify a Target's Supernatural Actions. Have Arcane Spellcasting (INT or WIS). Are Immune to Mental Status Effects. Can see in Complete Darkness.

options.label: Dragonoid
options.description: Can Breathe out a cone of chosen Energy once every 4 hours. Choose two Dragon Bloodlines: Fire, Frost, Acid, Sonic, or Electric. +50% Resistance to one Element, -50% Resistance to other Element. Possess Natural Weapons. Can see in Complete Darkness. Can assume a Humanoid alternate form.

options.label: Demon
options.description: Possess Wings and can Fly as easily as running. Can reduce the Attributes of nearby Good-Karma enemies. Can see in Complete Darkness. Have an increased understanding of Mental Status Effects, Charisma is considered 2x higher.

options.label: Redeemed Demon
options.description: A Redeemed Demon reverses Light and Dark Resistances and Karma Abilities. Possess Wings and can Fly as easily as running. Can reduce the Attributes of nearby Evil-Karma enemies. Can see in Complete Darkness. Have an increased understanding of Mental Status Effects, Charisma is considered 2x higher.

options.label: Arthropod
options.description: Can see in a limited 360 degree FoV, granting Immunity to Critical Hits. Can see in Complete Darkness. Possess Natural Weapons. Can Repair their Natural Weapons and Exoskeleton.

options.label: Vermes
options.description: Limbs slowly Regenerate. Can see in Complete Darkness. Are almost impossible to Grapple. Are Immune to Mental Status Effects, Blind, and Deaf, but INT and WIS are considered 2x lower.

options.label: Roper
options.description: Being Detected can afflict Targets with Revulsion or Fear. Can Parasitize a Humanoid or Demi-Humanoid NPC below their Level to take control of their body (Uses host's stats with bonus from parasite's Level, Parasite takes 50% of damage that the Host takes). Can see in a limited 360 degree FoV, granting Immunity to Critical Hits. Can manipulate body to fit into small openings.

options.label: Doppelganger (Martial)
options.description: Can assume an alternate form. This form can be any Humanoid or Demi-Humanoid NPC's appearance. While in alternate form Attributes, Resistances and Stats are changed to that of new form, adjusted to 60% of Doppelganger's Level. Can Perform a lengthy ritual to change their alternate form, but can only have one alternate form at a time. Being Detected can afflict Targets with Fear. Can Perform an action to Detect a Target's weaknesses.

options.label: Doppelganger (Caster)
options.description: Can assume an alternate form. This form can be any Humanoid or Demi-Humanoid NPC's appearance. While in alternate form Attributes, Resistances and Stats are changed to that of new form, adjusted to 60% of Doppelganger's Level. Can Perform a lengthy ritual to change their alternate form, but can only have one alternate form at a time. Being Detected can afflict Targets with Fear. Can Perform an action to Detect a Target's weaknesses.

options.label: Planterran
options.description: Vitality and Mana Regenerate faster while in direct sunlight. Can see in a limited 360 degree FoV, granting Immunity to Critical Hits. Have Nature Spellcasting (WIS or CON). Possess Natural Weapons.

options.label: Myconid
options.description: Can see in a limited 360 degree FoV, granting Immunity to Critical Hits. Are Immune to Mental Status Effects, Blind, and Deaf, but INT and WIS are considered 2x lower. Limbs slowly Regenerate. Can inflict nearby Targets with Confusion or Revulsion.

options.label: Slime
options.description: Can see in a limited 360 degree FoV, granting Immunity to Critical Hits. Can manipulate their body to fit into small openings. Are twice as hard to Grapple, Knock Out, or Stagger. Possess a small, separate Inventory that cannot be Stolen from.

options.label: Fairy
options.description: Can issue simple commands to Beast and Plant NPCs. Have Nature Spellcasting (WIS or CHA). Can slip into small openings, but Strength is considered 2x lower. Have Wings and can Fly as easily as walking.

options.label: Nymph (Flumine)
options.description: Flumine Nymphs have a Dolphin-like tail and can Breathe Underwater indefinitely. Being Detected can afflict Targets with Fascination. Can shift into a Unique Bestial form, in which they possess Natural Weapons. Can see in Dim Lighting.

options.label: Nymph (Sylvan)
options.description: Sylvan Nymphs have cloven hooves and can issue simple commands to Plant NPCs. Being Detected can afflict Targets with Fascination. Can shift into a Unique Bestial form, in which they possess Natural Weapons. Can see in Dim Lighting.

options.label: Nymph (Lamia)
options.description: Lamia Nymphs have a snake-like lower body and receive no movement penalty regardless of Environment. Being Detected can afflict Targets with Fascination. Can shift into a Unique Bestial form, in which they possess Natural Weapons. Can see in Dim Lighting.

options.label: Lycanthrope
options.description: Choose a Beastman base appearance. Can see in Complete Darkness. Can identify a Target's Physical Actions. Possess Natural Weapons. Can assume a Humanoid alternate form.

options.label: Automaton
options.description: Cannot Regenerate Vitality naturally over time or drink Consumables, but can replace parts of their body with Tinkered Equipment DLC. Can control their limbs remotely. Are Immune to Mental Status Effects. Know how to use Martial Weaponry.

options.label: Awakened Golem
options.description: They can Perform an action to absorb their base material into Vitality. Must choose either Wood, Copper, or Clay for base material. Strength and Constitution are considered 2x higher, but cannot Regenerate Vitality naturally over time or drink Consumables. Are twice as hard to Knock Out or Stagger. Can see in a limited 360 degree FoV, granting Immunity to Critical Hits.

options.label: Undead
options.description: Choose a Humanoid or Demi-Humanoid base appearance, then choose your Level of Decay (Pale Skin, Rotting, or Skeletal). Can see in Complete Darkness. Have limitless Stamina and Immune to Critical Hits, but cannot Regenerate Vitality naturally over time. Immune to Mental Status Effects. Have +15 to one Knowledge or Craft Skill (not yet implemented).

subcategories.name: Advanced Racial Classes
subcategories.text: Can skip if not a Heteromorph. Can only pick one Level 10 Racial Class, but can pick any Level 5 you qualify after.

options.label: Archangel
options.description: Know how to use Martial Weaponry. Can deal additional damage to Evil-karma Targets. Can detect a Target's Karma score.

options.label: Astral Deva
options.description: Possess True Sight, able to see through all Illusions and see a Target's true form. Can Perform an action to Negate or Dispel a Spell or Magic effect, once every 4 hours.

options.label: Principality
options.description: Can emit an Aura that increases the Attributes of Good-karma allies. Can Perform an action to bestow a Target with increased Physical or Supernatural action speed, or Immunity to Fear effects, once every 6 hours.

options.label: Seraph
options.description: Can assume a Humanoid alternate form. Spoken words can be understood by All Creatures, and are Immune to Silence. Being Detected can afflict Targets with Charm or Fascination.

options.label: Cherubim
options.description: Can rapidly Regenerate lost limbs, as such Constitution is considered 2x higher. Can Perform an action to cure an ally of a Physical Status Effect.

options.label: Choral
options.description: Can Perform a lengthy cast time to cast a spell at halved Mana Cost. Can Perform an action to inflict a Target with Charm or Fascination.

options.label: Infernal
options.description: Have Immunity to Heat, but are -50% Resistant to Electricity. Can Perform an Action to inflict nearby Targets with Confusion or Fascination. Can issue simple commands to weak Demon NPCs.

options.label: Archdevil
options.description: Can issue simple commands to all weak NPCs. Immune to Mental Status Effects.

options.label: Pit Fiend
options.description: Can emit an Aura that increases Attributes of Demon allies. Can summon a horde of weak Demon NPCs, once every 24 hours.

options.label: Succubus
options.description: Can assume a Humanoid alternate form. Can Perform an Action to inflict a Target with Charm. Can absorb Vitality from a Target through touch.

options.label: Lilin
options.description: Can briefly edit an NPC's combat settings through touch. Can issue simple commands to Target afflicted with Charm.

options.label: Omnibus
options.description: Can assume the form of any non-unique NPC. Targets that Detect you are afflicted with Charm, Fascination, or Confusion.

options.label: Bright Lord
options.description: Can issue simple commands to Good-Karma NPCs below your Level. Light (and Radiant) spells deal additional damage to Evil-Karma NPCs. Can Purchase radiant Spells from the Yggdrasil Cash Shop.

options.label: Radiant Lord
options.description: Gain +50% Resistance (Immunity) to Light Elemental damage, but gain -50% weakness to Dark. Can cast Light (and Radiant) spells 50% faster.

options.label: Dark Lord
options.description: Can issue simple commands to Evil-Karma NPCs below your Level. Dark (and Shadow) Spells deal additional damage to Good-Karma Targets. Can Purchase shadow Spell from the Yggdrasil Cash Shop.

options.label: Shadow Lord
options.description: Gain +50% Resistance (Immunity) to Dark Elemental damage, but gain -50% weakness to Light. Can cast Dark (and Shadow) spells 50% faster.

options.label: Genie
options.description: Ethereal alternate form becomes your base appearance, and can assume a Humanoid alternate form. Can cast any not known spell, but only at the behest of Others. This generates a spell or magical effect that will be suited to the task of accomplishing the 'wish'. Has a chance of backfiring horribly when 'wish' is worded improperly. Are specialized in the Conjuration spell school, and can cast Conjuration spells at halved Mana cost.

options.label: Ifrit
options.description: Can identify a Target's Supernatural Actions. Can Cast Spells of Heat Elemental Energy at halved Mana Cost, with increased Burn DoT duration.

options.label: Houri
options.description: Can emit an Aura that slowly restores Vitality of nearby allies. Can Perform an action to cure an ally of a Mental Status Effect.

options.label: Shoulder Devil
options.description: Can slip into small openings, but Strength is considered 2x lower. Can cast spells that inflict Mental Status Effects at halved Mana cost.

options.label: Titan
options.description: Colossal beings of immense power. Choose one attribute: its maximum is reduced by 2, but you gain unique Titan abilities. If your current value exceeds the new cap, excess points are refunded for redistribution. RESET YOUR ATTRIBUTES BEFORE SELECTING THIS OPTION

options.label: Asura
options.description: Fierce demigods of war and chaos. Choose one attribute: its maximum is reduced by 2, but you gain unique Asura abilities. If your current value exceeds the new cap, excess points are refunded for redistribution. RESET YOUR ATTRIBUTES BEFORE SELECTING THIS OPTION

options.label: Enlightened One
options.description: Can consume the brain of a slain Humanoid or Demi-Humanoid in order to learn one additional Arcane Spell. Can briefly edit an NPC's combat settings through touch. Can issue simple commands to weak NPCs.

options.label: Old One
options.description: Choose one spell school to specialize in, you cast spells from that school at halved Mana cost. Being Detected can afflict Targets with Fear, Despair, or Revulsion.

options.label: Mindflayer
options.description: Can Perform an Action to inflict a Target with a Mental Status Effect. Can issue simple commands to weak NPCs. Specialized in Enchantment spell school, you cast spells from that school at halved Mana cost.

options.label: Souldrinker
options.description: Can Perform an Action to drain Vitality and Mana on touch. Can briefly edit an NPC's combat settings through touch.

options.label: Deep One
options.description: Gain +50% Resistance (Immunity) to Dark Elemental damage, but gain -25% weakness to Light. Can breathe Underwater indefinitely, and are Immune to Deep Underwater Environment Status Effects.

options.label: Ascendant
options.description: +50% Resistance (Immunity) to Bloodline's Energy type, damage taken of Bloodline's energy gets converted into Vitality. Can sprout Wings and can fly as easily as running. Possess scales as strong as Medium Armor.

options.label: Wyrm Lord
options.description: Can assume the form of an adult Dragon once every 168 hours. While shapeshifted, all Attributes receive an effective +8 bonus, and can use your breath attack at-will. Are Immune to Sleep and Paralysis.

options.label: Angel-Blood / Demon-Blood
options.description: Replace your Bloodline's Energy type with either Light or Dark. Resistances change accordingly, but you gain +25% Resistance of your previous Bloodline (e.g., if you had 100% Heat, -50% Cold and pick Light, you have 25% Heat, 100% Light, -50% Dark). Breath attack is now a wide beam of your new Energy, with a longer range but a smaller hitbox, usable every 2 hours.

options.label: Arachnid
options.description: Can walk or run normally on walls and ceilings. Exoskeleton is as strong as Light Armor. Natural Weapon secretes a Poison DoT

options.label: Ariadne
options.description: Can assume a Humanoid alternate form. Can produce a silk-like thread that can be woven into webs (that Slow or Stop) or Crafted Objects. These Crafted Objects have an inherent Data Level of [(Total Level/10)+1]

options.label: Scorpiones
options.description: Possess an additional Natural Weapon. Secondary Natural Weapon can cause Charm or Confusion, while Primary Natural Weapon deals additional damage. Secondary Natural Weapon doesn't secrete a Poison DoT.

options.label: Vinegaroon
options.description: Natural Weapons deal additional Acid damage and make it twice as easy to Grapple Targets. Movement speed scales with unused Carry Weight Limit.

options.label: Crustacean
options.description: Have an additional pair of arms, as such can dual-wield on the same side of arms. Exoskeleton is as strong as Heavy Armor, but can't equip normal Armor. Can breathe Underwater indefinitely.

options.label: Cancer
options.description:
Receive a bonus to your Natural Armor rating that scales with Constitution. Can molt armor, losing Natural Armor protection for 24 hours, molted exoskeleton can be repurposed into Crafted Objects. These Crafted Objects have an inherent Data Level of [(Total Level/10)+1] (COIDL).

Deselect COIDL from the dropdown if you want to de-select this option.

options.label: Mantis Shrimp
options.description: Can Perform an attack Action to inflict Target with Blind or Stun, once every hour. Natural Weapons deal additional Sonic damage.

options.label: Barnacle Mass
options.description: Can rapidly Regenerate lost limbs, as such Constitution is considered 2x higher. Immune to instant Death and Doom, but gain -75% Resistance to Heat.

options.label: Dictyopterran
options.description: Can consume Junk items to restore Vitality. Exoskeleton is as strong as Light Armor. Movement speed scales with Carry Weight Limit.

options.label: Mantis
options.description: Can Perform an action to inflict Fear or Fascination on a Target. Deal double damage to Targets that do not Detect you.

options.label: Roach
options.description: Constitution is considered 2x higher. Are able to slip into tight spaces.

options.label: Termite
options.description: Deal triple damage to structures with Natural Weapons. Immune to Blind and Deafness.

options.label: Hymenopterran
options.description: Have Wings and can fly as easily as running.Exoskeleton is as strong as Medium ArmorNatural Weapon secretes a Poison DoT.

options.label: Ant
options.description: Can walk or run normally on walls. Strength is considered 2x higher.

options.label: Wasp
options.description: Natural Weapons can Sap DoT and it's 50% easier to Grapple Targets. Movement speed scales with unused Carry Weight Limit.

options.label: Bee
options.description: It's twice as hard for a Grappled Target to escape once Grappled. Can create a honey-like substance that acts as a strong healing potion when consumed.

options.label: Cricket
options.description: Have an additional pair of arms, as such can dual-wield on the same side of arms. Exoskeleton is as strong as Light Armor. Can Jump up to five times higher by preparing for a moment.

options.label: Grasshopper
options.description: Have Wings and can fly as easily as running. Deal 50% increased damage when attacking while jumping or flying

options.label: Mole Cricket
options.description: Can burrow through the ground as easily as running. Can Perform an Action to inflict Sleep on a Target, once every hour.

options.label: Locust
options.description: Receive no movement penalty regardless of Environment. Can Perform an Action to summon a horde of locusts that inflict Disease DoT AoE, once every 24 hours

options.label: Scarab
options.description: Have an additional pair of arms, as such can dual-wield on the same side of arms. Exoskeleton is as strong as Heavy Armor, but can't equip normal Armor . Are twice as hard to Knock Out or Stagger

options.label: Hercules
options.description: Can cast Spells while simultaneously wielding a Weapon. Strength is considered 2x higher.

options.label: Goliath
options.description: Can Perform other Physical Actions at no penalty while Grappling a Target. When Grappling can use all four arms to deal additional damage that scales with Strength

options.label: Odonate
options.description: Have Wings and can fly as easily as running. Exoskeleton is as strong as Light Armor. Know how to use Ranged Weaponry.

options.label: Dragonfly
options.description: Gain an additional 50% Resistance to an Elemental Energy Type of your choice. Can imbue your Ranged attacks with that Energy type

options.label: Damselfly
options.description: While Flying you are 25% harder to hit with Ranged attacks or 'Ray'-type spells. Movement speed scale with unused Carry Weight Limit

options.label: Fly
options.description: Have Wings and can fly as easily as running. Exoskeleton is as strong as Light Armor. While flying you are 25% harder to hit with Ranged attacks and 'Ray'-type spells.

options.label: Butterfly
options.description: Gain 25% Light damage Resistance and Mana Regeneration is Enhanced during the day. Can Perform an action to inflict a Target with Panic or Charm

options.label: Moth
options.description: Gain 25% Dark damage Resistance and Mana Regeneration is Enhanced during the night. Can Perform an action to inflict a Target with Confusion or Sleep

options.label: Caddisfly
options.description: Can Breathe Underwater indefinitely. Can Perform an action to Enhance Natural Armor to be as strong as Medium Armor, once every 8 hours

options.label: Mosquito
options.description: Can absorb Vitality from a Target using stinger-like mouth (while Grappling). Any DoT effects inflicted on a Target last much longer, and Natural Weapons cause Bleed DoT

options.label: Leech
options.description: Can breathe Underwater indefinitely. Can see in Complete Darkness. Can absorb Vitality from a Target using your mouth (while Grappling)

options.label: Bloodletter
options.description: Harder to Detect while Underwater. Twice as hard to Knock Out or Stagger

options.label: Earthworm
options.description: Can burrow through the ground as easily as running. You are harder to Detect while Underground. Remaining motionless while Underground Enhances Stamina and Mana Regeneration.

options.label: Sandworm
options.description: Can now burrow through the ground 50% faster. Strength is considered 2x higher

options.label: Herroper
options.description: Possess tentacle Natural Weapons that have a change to inflict Poison DoT or Disease DoT on Targets. Twice as easy to Grapple Targets. Can Perform an Action to inflict Fascination on a Target, once every 4 hours

options.label: Living Curse
options.description: Can possess inanimate Armor not bigger than oneself. Gain Natural Armor as strong as possessed Armor. Know how to use Martial Weaponry

options.label: Greater Doppelganger
options.description: Alternate form can now be any non-unique NPC. Can assume any number of alternate forms, and can change alternate forms at-will. While in alternate form Attributes, Resistances and Stats are changed to that of new form, adjusted to 80% of Doppelganger's Level

options.label: Changeling
options.description: Alternate forms can now be any Humanoid, Demi-Humanoid, or Heteromorphic Races. Can assume the form of any Creature for a short time, Stats and Resistances are changed to that of new form.

options.label: Mimic
options.description: Can assume the form an inanimate Objects not bigger than oneself. While in the form of an Object and motionless you are Invisible to Perception passive Detection

options.label: Death Vine
options.description:
Natural Weapons secrete a Poison DoT
  Can breathe a cone of noxious fumes that applies a Poison DoT, once every 4 hours
  Can Grapple a Target to inflict Poison DoT damage

options.label: Medusoid
options.description: Natural Weapons and breath attack have a chance to inflict Petrification. Breath attacks have a chance of Ignoring a Target's Resistances

options.label: Shambling Moss
options.description: Can rapidly Regenerate lost limbs, as such Constitution is considered 2x higher. Have double success rate on Actions that use Climb or Grapple. Can breathe Underwater indefinitely

options.label: Lurker
options.description: While remaining motionless in Forest or Swampland Environment become Invisible to Perception passive Detection. While remaining motionless in Forest or Swampland Environment Mana Regeneration is Enhanced

options.label: Dryad
options.description: While remaining motionless in Forest or Swampland Environment become Invisible to Perception passive Detection.  Have Bark as Natural Armor that is as strong as Light Armor.  Natural Weapons deal additional Acid damage.

options.label: Spriggan
options.description: Can Perform an Action to restore Vitality and remove a Mental Status Effect on a Target. Can issue simple commands to Beast and Plant NPCs

options.label: Alraune
options.description: While remaining motionless in Forest or Swampland Environment Mana Regeneration is Enhanced. Can assume a Humanoid alternate form. Can Perform an Action to inflict a Target with Confusion, Charm, or Fascination Mental Status Effects.

options.label: Alraune Queen
options.description: Can emit an Aura that restores the Vitality and grants Immunity to Cold for nearby Plants. Can issue simple commands to Plant NPCs, and Faefolk NPCs become a Summoner option.

options.label: Treant
options.description: Have Bark as Natural Armor that is as strong as Medium Armor. Strength and Constitution are considered 2x higher, but Dexterity is considered 2x lower. Are twice as hard to Knock Out or Stagger

options.label: Tree King
options.description: Can create a small Forest Environment at surrounded location, once every 72 hours. While remaining motionless in Forest or Swampland Environment become Invisible to Perception passive Detection

options.label: Puffball
options.description: While remaining motionless in Forest or Swampland Environment Mana Regeneration is Enhanced. Can emit an Aura that inflicts random Mental Status Effects on Targets, once an hour. Can emit an Aura that inflicts Poison DoT on Targets
